about_the_game:
You take control of Joan, an ex-military who is dragged to a much more personal war when Elliot, Joan’s girlfriend, is kidnapped by a mysterious enemy force. She must chase the culprits through a paradisiac island and save her girlfriend.

With its roots in classic games from the 90s like Virtua Cop 2 and Time Crisis, Grand Shooter innovates by bringing a big variety of guns for players to use, such as pistols, rifles, shotguns and machineguns.

MORE THAN 70 MISSIONS!

Get along Joan in her chase for Elliot, defeating the enemies in her way and watching out for civilians. Each main mission tells a part of the whole story, unraveling its secrets and getting close to rescue her girlfriend.

Are you brave enough to get to the bottom of this?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD GCN+, NVIDIA Kepler+, or Intel HD 5000-series or newer
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13.6 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable GPU (AMD GCN-based GPU or newer, NVIDIA Kepler-based GPU or newer, Intel HD 4000 or newer)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Grand Shooter is the reinvention of the Light Gun On-Rails Shooter genre, from old school arcades to modern devices. Shoot everything that moves—just make sure they aren't hostages! 🙆‍♂️🔜💔
